fields.label: Does your business have risk-based systems and controls to respond to discrepancies arising during beneficial owner verification?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-based systems and controls used to respond to beneficial owner verification discrepancies.

fields.label: Does your business have procedures to follow when you are unable to determine the identity of a beneficial owner?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedures followed when a beneficial owner's identity cannot be determined.

fields.label: For companies or partnerships, does your business identify and verify individuals entitled to exercise 25% or more of voting rights (including veto power)?
For companies or partnerships, does your business identify and verify individuals holding the position of senior managing official?
For trusts, does your business identify and verify any individual who holds the power to appoint or remove the trustees?
For associations or registered co-operatives, does your business identify and verify individuals entitled to exercise 25% or more of voting rights?
For associations or registered co-operatives, does your business identify and verify individuals entitled to 25% or more of the property upon dissolution?
For associations or registered co-operatives, does your business identify and verify individuals holding the position of senior managing official?
Does your business have risk-management systems to determine whether a customer or beneficial owner is a politically exposed person (PEP)?
fields.detail-label: Describe the risk-management systems used to determine PEP status.

fields.label: For domestic or international organisation PEPs, does your business comply with the identification requirements specified for individual customers (4.2.3 to 4.2.9)?
For domestic or international organisation PEPs, does your business determine whether the person is of high ML/TF risk?
fields.detail-label: Describe the process for assessing the ML/TF risk level of domestic or international PEPs.

fields.label: For foreign PEPs or high-risk domestic/international PEPs, does your business identify the PEP as if they were an individual customer (4.2.3 to 4.2.9)?
For foreign PEPs or high-risk domestic/international PEPs, does your business obtain senior management approval before establishing or continuing the business relationship?
fields.detail-label: Describe the senior management approval process for foreign or high-risk PEPs.

fields.label: For foreign PEPs or high-risk domestic/international PEPs, does your business take reasonable measures to establish the PEP's source of wealth and source of funds?
fields.detail-label: Describe the measures used to establish the PEP's source of wealth and source of funds.

fields.label: Does your business have risk-based systems and controls to respond to discrepancies arising during PEP verification?
fields.detail-label: Describe the procedure for resolving discrepancies found during the PEP verification process.
